name: VLI  (Virtue, Liberty, Independence)
additionalNotes:
VLI

If you like our Pennsylvania Broad Leaf blend (PANACEA Green Label), you most likely will LOVE this cigar.

VLI (Virtue, Liberty, and Independence)  has a Pennsylvania wrapper and Pennsylvania filler.  Ok, ok, it's not a puro...there is Dominican and Nicaraguan leaf in the middle too.  BUT!  It's about as close as you can get to a PA Puro as possible and still have a first class, award winning blend. (awards coming soon:)
 
 A Full bodied cigar that is medium to strong.
